21 1 13 1 92 881 1511 1088 1535 zero-dimensional,
21 1 13 2 88 1101 1512 1135 1530 i.e.
21 1 13 3 96 1150 1511 1263 1530 restricted

35 1 1 11 93 1514 1733 1560 1753 first

35 1 2 7 95 1376 1766 1439 1785 work:

35 1 3 1 96 881 1797 1021 1817 fluctuations

35 1 4 3 95 1064 1830 1113 1849 that

35 1 5 10 96 1508 1862 1561 1881 then
